portfolio.title: Executive Coaching Consultancy
portfolio.subHeading: Executive Coaching Consultancy provide support to clients as they progress toward being equitable workplaces.
portfolio.intro: I built the Executive Coaching Consultancy while working for Go Up. The Client's website was using the classic version of WordPress which meant they could not easily change the content/layout of their website without contacting a developer. They wanted Go Up to rebuild the website within Gutenburg so they could customise it as needed.
portfolio.conclusion: Converting the Executive Coaching Consultancy website from Classic Editor to the Gutenburg Editor allowed the client to make changes to their website without needing to contact a developer, saving the company time and money.
portfolio.getInTouch: Have an issue like Executive Coaching Consultancy faced?

portfolio.title: Pitch
portfolio.subHeading: Pitch is an integrated communications agency building brands people can be passionate about.
portfolio.intro: I built the Pitch while working for Go Up. Pitch wanted to rebrand their website to better portray the case studies they had completed and the high level clientele they work with.
portfolio.conclusion: Rebranding the Pitch site with a focus on large large and high definition images has lead to a more impressive site. In return Pitch have seen an increase in cutomers and enquiries.
portfolio.getInTouch: Would you like a website like Pitch?

portfolio.title: Crash Charity
portfolio.subHeading: Crash are an organisation who help homelessness charities and hospices with vital construction projects.
portfolio.intro: I built the Crash Charity website while working for Go Up. Crash approached Go Up looking to rebrand the company, including the website, with the aim to look professional and attractive and ultimtley get donations.
portfolio.conclusion: Rebranding the Company and website has led to a impressive and professional website, which clearly dictates who Crash are and how they help Charities. With a focus on UX, it makes it a easier site to navigate and ultimelty allows the users to donate to thier causes easily.
portfolio.getInTouch: Do you need to clarify who you are and what you provide for customers?

portfolio.title: Auditstar
portfolio.intro: I built the Auditstar website while working for Go Up. Auditstar wanted to rebrand their website to clarify what they do as a company and attract further clients. They also wanted to have multiple languages to appeal to clientele in the relevant countries.
portfolio.conclusion: Rebranding the Auditstar website and enabling multiple languages allowed the client to expand their reach and attract more clients in their target countries.
portfolio.getInTouch: Do you operate in more than one country?

portfolio.title: NoDishrespect
portfolio.subHeading: NoDishrespect was a reciepe and food blogging website.
portfolio.url: This website is no longer online
portfolio.intro: In July 2020 I was appraoched by 2 friends who were looking to redesign and rebuild their website. Using the WP Recipe Maker plugin I helped redeisgn and rebuild the site, with a focus on high quality imagry to attract users and make the look as attractive as possible.
portfolio.conclusion: Rebuilding the NoDishrespect website enabled the client to easily upload reciepes and images, as well as allowing users to easily browse the site to find and follow the recipes with ease.
portfolio.getInTouch: Do you have a blogging website that needs a revamp?

portfolio.title: Natural High Safaris
portfolio.subHeading: Natural High Safaris provide exclusive, hand picked, top of the range Safaris.
portfolio.intro: I built Natural High Safaris while working for Go Up. Natural High Safaris (NH) approached Go Up to assist with rebranding and creating a new website during the Covid 19 period.
portfolio.conclusion: A new website with a focus on UX, allow users to navigate and eailsy understand the Safaris available and the details and experiences of each. The site allows users to easily contact the client to enquire about going on a Safari.
portfolio.getInTouch: Do you need a change of website to gain more enquiries?

portfolio.title: AQ Revolution
portfolio.subHeading: AQ Revolution are a London based Company helping organisations, leaders and teams harness the freedom to truly think.
portfolio.intro: AQ Revolution was the first Freelance website I built. They were reffered to be by a former employer (Kuki Digital). They were a new company and wanted to have a website focused on imagtry to fully protray who they are as a company.
portfolio.conclusion: Using parralax images, we were able to convey to users the ideallology of AQ Revolution.
portfolio.getInTouch: Want to get your companies message out there?

portfolio.title: Hatton Adventure World
portfolio.subHeading: Hatton Adventure World are part of the Hatton Country Park based in Hatton. This website is for the Adventure World located there.
portfolio.intro: I built the Hatton Adventure World website while working for Kuki Digital. Hatton Country World were a long time client of Kuki and wanted to bring all their websites together with the same design.
portfolio.conclusion: Hatton Adventure World give the customer an idea fo what there is to explore. The design lets users know it is an advture park.

portfolio.title: Hatton Shopping Village
portfolio.subHeading: Hatton Shopping Village are part of the Hatton Country Park based in Hatton. This website is for the Shopping Village located there.
portfolio.intro: I built the Hatton Shopping Village website while working for Kuki Digital. Hatton Country World were a long time client of Kuki and wanted to bring all their websites together with the same design.

portfolio.title: Hatton Estate
portfolio.subHeading: Hatton Estate is part of the Hatton Country Park based in Hatton. This website describes the Estate and the activites available.
portfolio.intro: I built the Hatton Estate website while working for Kuki Digital. Hatton Country World were a long time client of Kuki and wanted to bring all their websites together with the same design.
